bash.check_breaches:
#!/bin/bash
# Privacy Rights Clearinghouse Breach Monitor - FREE!

echo "🔐 PRC Data Breach Monitor (FREE!)"
echo "==================================="
echo "Date: $(date)"
echo ""

# Display breach database information
echo "📊 Data Breach Database:"
echo "   🔗 https://privacyrights.org/data-breaches"
echo "   📅 Coverage: 2005-present"
echo "   📈 8,000+ breaches documented"
echo "   💾 Billions of records tracked"
echo ""

# Breach categories
echo "📋 Breach Types Monitored:"
echo "   • HACK - Hacking or Malware"
echo "   • CARD - Payment Card Fraud"
echo "   • INSD - Insider Breach"
echo "   • PHYS - Physical Loss"
echo "   • PORT - Portable Device"
echo "   • STAT - Stationary Device"
echo "   • DISC - Unintended Disclosure"
echo "   • UNKN - Unknown"
echo ""

# Consumer guides
echo "📚 Consumer Privacy Guides:"
echo "   🔗 https://privacyrights.org/consumer-guides"
echo "   • Online Privacy"
echo "   • Financial Privacy"
echo "   • Medical Privacy"
echo "   • Identity Theft Protection"
echo "   • Opt-Out Instructions"
echo ""

# Privacy tools
echo "🛠️ FREE Privacy Tools:"
echo "   • Data Broker Opt-Out Guide"
echo "   • Privacy Complaint Templates"
echo "   • CCPA Request Forms"
echo "   • Credit Freeze Instructions"
echo "   • Privacy Rights Fact Sheets"
echo ""

# Resources
echo "📖 Additional Resources:"
echo "   🎧 Privacy Today Podcast"
echo "   📰 Privacy News & Updates"
echo "   📋 Sample Privacy Policies"
echo "   ⚖️ Privacy Laws Database"
echo "   🔍 Privacy Research Reports"
echo ""

echo "💡 Quick Privacy Tips:"
echo "   1. Check if your data was breached"
echo "   2. Freeze your credit reports"
echo "   3. Opt out of data brokers"
echo "   4. Review privacy settings regularly"
echo "   5. Minimize data sharing"
echo ""

echo "📅 Report generated: $(date)"
echo "🔗 Visit: https://privacyrights.org"

curl.access_resources:
# Access PRC resources - FREE!
curl -s 'https://privacyrights.org/' | grep -o '<a href="[^"]*"' | grep -E 'guide|breach|privacy' | head -20

python.breach_database_monitor:
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import csv
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import json

class PRCBreachMonitor:
    """Monitor Privacy Rights Clearinghouse breach database - FREE!"""
    
    def __init__(self):
        self.base_url = 'https://privacyrights.org'
        self.breach_url = f'{self.base_url}/data-breaches'
    
    def search_recent_breaches(self, days_back=30):
        """Search for recent data breaches"""
        print(f"🔍 Privacy Rights Clearinghouse Breach Monitor (FREE!)\n")
        print(f"Searching breaches from last {days_back} days...\n")
        
        try:
            # Note: Actual implementation would require parsing the website
            # This is a demonstration of the structure
            response = requests.get(self.breach_url)
            
            if response.status_code == 200:
                print("✅ Connected to PRC breach database")
                
                # Sample breach categories
                categories = {
                    'HACK': 'Hacking or Malware',
                    'CARD': 'Payment Card Fraud',
                    'INSD': 'Insider Breach',
                    'PHYS': 'Physical Loss',
                    'PORT': 'Portable Device',
                    'STAT': 'Stationary Device',
                    'DISC': 'Unintended Disclosure',
                    'UNKN': 'Unknown'
                }
                
                print("📊 Breach Categories Tracked:")
                for code, desc in categories.items():
                    print(f"   • {code}: {desc}")
                
                print("\n🔗 Access full breach database at:")
                print(f"   {self.breach_url}")
                
                return True
            else:
                print(f"❌ Failed to connect: {response.status_code}")
                return False
                
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"Error accessing breach database: {e}")
            return False
    
    def get_breach_statistics(self):
        """Get breach statistics and trends"""
        print("📈 PRC Breach Statistics (FREE!)\n")
        
        # Provide information about available statistics
        print("📊 Available Breach Metrics:")
        print("   • Total breaches since 2005")
        print("   • Records exposed by year")
        print("   • Breaches by organization type")
        print("   • Breach methods and causes")
        print("   • Geographic distribution")
        print("   • Industry sector analysis")
        
        print("\n💡 Key Insights Available:")
        print("   • Trending breach types")
        print("   • Most affected industries")
        print("   • Common attack vectors")
        print("   • Prevention recommendations")
        
        print(f"\n🔗 View detailed statistics at: {self.breach_url}")
        
        return self.breach_url
    
    def get_privacy_guides(self):
        """Get consumer privacy guides"""
        guides_url = f"{self.base_url}/consumer-guides"
        
        print("📚 PRC Consumer Privacy Guides (FREE!)\n")
        
        # Categories of guides available
        guide_categories = [
            "Online Privacy & Technology",
            "Financial Privacy",
            "Medical Privacy",
            "Workplace Privacy",
            "Identity Theft",
            "Government Records",
            "Marketing & Telemarketing",
            "Privacy Rights & Laws"
        ]
        
        print("📖 Available Guide Categories:")
        for category in guide_categories:
            print(f"   • {category}")
        
        print("\n🛡️ Popular Privacy Guides:")
        popular_guides = [
            "How to Opt Out of Data Broker Sites",
            "Protecting Your Social Security Number",
            "Freezing Your Credit",
            "California Privacy Rights (CCPA)",
            "HIPAA Medical Privacy Rights",
            "Workplace Surveillance and Privacy",
            "Smart Home Device Privacy",
            "Children's Online Privacy"
        ]
        
        for guide in popular_guides:
            print(f"   • {guide}")
        
        print(f"\n🔗 Access all guides at: {guides_url}")
        
        return guides_url
    
    def generate_privacy_report(self):
        """Generate comprehensive privacy intelligence report"""
        print(f"🔐 Privacy Rights Clearinghouse Report (FREE!)")
        print(f"Report Date: {datetime.now().strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')}\n")
        
        # Search recent breaches
        print("=" * 50)
        print("📊 DATA BREACH INTELLIGENCE")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.search_recent_breaches()
        
        # Get statistics
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("📈 BREACH TRENDS & STATISTICS")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.get_breach_statistics()
        
        # Get privacy guides
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("📚 CONSUMER PRIVACY RESOURCES")
        print("=" * 50)
        self.get_privacy_guides()
        
        # Additional resources
        print("\n" + "=" * 50)
        print("🔧 PRIVACY TOOLS & RESOURCES")
        print("=" * 50)
        print("\n🛠️ FREE Privacy Tools:")
        print("   • Opt-Out Guide: https://privacyrights.org/consumer-guides/opt-out-guides")
        print("   • Privacy Complaint Letter Generator")
        print("   • Data Broker List and Removal Instructions")
        print("   • Privacy Rights Fact Sheets")
        print("   • Sample CCPA Request Letters")
        
        print("\n🎧 Privacy Today Podcast:")
        print("   • Weekly privacy news and tips")
        print("   • Expert interviews")
        print("   • Consumer privacy advice")
        print("   • Available on all podcast platforms")
        
        print("\n💡 Privacy Best Practices:")
        print("   1. Monitor breach notifications for your data")
        print("   2. Freeze credit with all three bureaus")
        print("   3. Opt out of data broker databases")
        print("   4. Use privacy-focused tools and services")
        print("   5. Know your privacy rights under state/federal law")
        print("   6. Regularly review privacy settings")
        print("   7. Minimize data sharing")
        
        print("\n📧 Stay Updated:")
        print("   • Subscribe to PRC newsletter")
        print("   • Follow @PrivacyToday on social media")
        print("   • Check breach database regularly")
        
        return True

# Usage
monitor = PRCBreachMonitor()
monitor.generate_privacy_report()

name: Privacy Rights Clearinghouse

best_practices: Regularly check the breach database for exposures
Use consumer guides for privacy protection
Follow opt-out guides for data brokers
Leverage complaint templates for privacy violations
Stay informed through the Privacy Today podcast
Reference fact sheets for privacy rights
operational_guidance.recommended_update_frequency: Check weekly for breach updates, monthly for new guides
operational_guidance.value_proposition: Nonprofit consumer advocacy organization providing free, comprehensive privacy resources and the most extensive public data breach database

quality_metrics.completeness: Extensive coverage of US data breaches since 2005
quality_metrics.data_quality: Comprehensive breach tracking with detailed categorization
quality_metrics.update_speed: Regular updates as breaches are disclosed
